metadata.title: Comfortview Women's Wide Width The Clea Espadrille
features: These effortlessly elegant espadrilles trade the traditional canvas style flats for uppers inspired by a woven raffia design to create a look that's undeniably versatile and perfectly suit for sunny days ahead.
Woven raffia-like upper, Elastic bungee straps for comfort and stretch
Flexible, skid-resistant outsole for a better grip, 1/2" jute-wrapped wedge platform; 2" jute-wrapped wedge heel

ABOUT THE BRAND: Shoes designed to be the best-fitting, best-feeling, best-looking footwear for every moment of your life. Our shoes feature flexible and skid resistant soles, stable heels and padded insoles. From casual shoes, to boots, to dress shoes we provide comfort and style every step of the day. Available in 30 sizes and widths.
description: These effortlessly elegant espadrilles trade the traditional canvas style flats for uppers inspired by a woven raffia design to create a look that's undeniably versatile and perfectly suit for sunny days ahead.  Note: There will be variations in the print due to the individualistic nature of the pattern Woven raffia-like upperElastic bungee straps for comfort and stretchPadded insole for comfort Flexible, skid-resistant outsole for a better grip1/2" jute-wrapped wedge platform; 2" jute-wrapped wedge heel  Woven raffia-like espadrilles with wearable wedge heel available in full and half sizes 7-11, 12 M, W, WW  Comfortview Collection: Offered in an inclusive size range of extended sizes and widths for a custom fit. Each shoe made with padded insoles and flexible outsoles for all day comfort.
